channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: There are 3 major theories as to why Mike Lynch’s Bayesian yacht sank so fast
item.description: The boat’s maker says the crew should have had time to rescue passengers.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Urban Outfitters, Peloton, Advance Auto Parts and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Peloton shares jump 34% as quarterly sales rise for first time in 2½ years
Doritos teams with SpaceX, St. Jude’s for new ‘Zero Gravity’ Cool Ranch chips
item.description: Chips were designed to keep their flavor in outer space, company says.

item.title: The stock market this week got 2 bullish signals as S&P 500 creeped back toward record highs
item.description: A fresh record high could soon be in the offing after two signals flashed in the stock market’s favor.

item.title: S&P and Nasdaq maintain gains as triple-digit Dow rally is reversed
Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck are splitting after two years. Here are your divorce odds, experts say
Snowflake shares sink 13% on decelerating product revenue growth
item.description: Shares of Snowflake fell after it released fiscal second-quarter 2025 earnings that showed decelerating product revenue growth compared to past quarte...

item.title: Keep an eye on this ‘wildcard’ when Nvidia’s quarterly earnings are reported
Gen Z and millennials flock to places with these attributes—key to winning the war for talent
item.description: Understanding why Gen Zers and millennials choose a particular city has never been more important given aging populations.

item.title: Philadelphia Fed President Harker advocates for interest rate cut in September
item.description: Harker gave the strongest statement yet from a central bank official that easing is almost a certainty next month.

item.title: U.S. home sales rise for the first time in five months
A German diaspora in North Carolina is booming thanks to a multibillion-dollar investment from Germany, but a potential Trump Presidency is causing anxiety
item.description: Thousands of Germans have flocked to North Carolina in recent years, aided by investments from Siemens and Daimler.

item.title: Home sales rose in July for the first time in five months
item.description: At the end of the month there were 1.33 million homes on the market, an increase of 0.8% from June and 19.8% higher than July 2023.

item.title: Stock market sees boom as bonds see economic disaster. Here’s why they disagree.
